articles.description: Mike Tindall is releasing limited edition Budgie Smugglers, a style of very tightfitting swimwear for men, after being accused of wearing his wife's swimwear on I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!

articles.title: Ealing Studios: Iconic London film facility set for makeover - BBC
articles.description: The west London facility, one of the world's oldest studios, has been home to several TV shows and film.
articles.content:
One of the world's oldest film studios, which has played an iconic role in British film and television, is set to get a makeover that will mean it can compete with Hollywood once more.
